EmailTemplate.name: 25AprilWeb-Presentations.Invite 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder: Presenting to Executive Clients
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We would like to remind you that on April 25 at 1 p.m. ET, we will hold a webinar titled "Powerful Proposal Presentations: How to Influence Executives and Win the Project <http://info.mbopartners.com/25AprilWebPresentations_RegistrationPage.html>."
Our speaker, presentation expert Dave Underhill, has over 20 years' experience training Fortune 500 clients on presentation skills. He will give you the tools you need to confidently deliver a strong proposal presentation to executives. Register today <http://info.mbopartners.com/25AprilWebPresentations_RegistrationPage.html> to sharpen your skills and build the confidence you need to seal the deal. ___________________________________ MBO Partners
t: 703-793-6000 e: webinar@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
